name: Left vs Right Tennis
description:
Use the thumb of your right hand to move the racquet on the right side.Use the thumb of your left hand to move the racquet on the left side.The racquet can be moved by touching a position on the screen or by dragging it.Touch the ball at a angle with the shape of the racquet to hit it.The point is played according to the rule which is the ball should cross the net line and cross the screen boundary.Ten points wins the game.

Should be played on mobile phone.
